alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Franklin; Lauderdale; Lawrence; Limestone; Winston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued November 04 at 5:16AM CDT until November 04 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: DRIER AIR AND LOW LEVEL WINDS BRIEFLY GUSTING AT TIMES WILL FOLLOW A COLD FRONT WHICH MOVED THROUGH THE CENTRAL TENNESSEE VALLEY THIS MORNING. THIS WILL RESULT IN AN ELEVATED FIRE DANGER RISK GIVEN THE NUMBER OF FIRES THAT HAVE IMPACTED MUCH OF NORTHERN ALABAMA OVER THE PAST FEW WEEKS. RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES AND SURFACE WINDS WILL THEN DIMINISH EARLY THIS EVENING. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR NORTHWEST ALABAMA... THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN HUNTSVILLE HAS ISSUED A RED FLAG WARNING...WHICH IS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM CDT THIS EVENING. * AFFECTED AREA...LAUDERDALE...COLBERT...FRANKLIN AL... LAWRENCE...LIMESTONE...AND WINSTON COUNTIES. * TIMING...11 AM CDT THROUGH 6 PM CDT. * WIND...NORTHEAST WINDS OF 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS AROUND 20 MPH AT TIMES. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...WILL BE NEAR OR JUST BELOW 25 PERCENT FOR A COUPLE OF HOURS. * IMPACTS...ANY FIRES THAT DEVELOP WILL LIKELY SPREAD RAPIDLY. OUTDOOR BURNING IS NOT RECOMMENDED.
info.instruction: A RED FLAG WARNING MEANS THAT CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS ARE EITHER OCCURRING NOW...OR WILL SHORTLY. COMBINATION OF STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY OVER A PROLONGED PERIOD WILL INCREASE FIRE GROWTH POTENTIAL.

area.areaDesc: Colbert; Franklin; Lauderdale; Lawrence; Limestone; Winston
